text: Hi Rasa, thanks for this! I’m sharing this on Facebook, is that ok? My circles are in this area and I thought there might be some syncs. If there’s any problem with this let me know and I’ll remove the post

text: Good morning! Do you have an employee in New York, with your business based in another state? I am hoping someone might help me with a specific question related to New York’s disability/PFL law. I am getting three different answers from my insurance broker, the NY Workers Comp Board and my payroll company. If you think you might have any knowledge on this front, please let me know!
